symptoms.title: AI Health Assistant
symptoms.subtitle: Get instant health advice
symptoms.emergencySubtext: Contact emergency services first in life-threatening situations
symptoms.initialMessage: Hello! I'm your AI health assistant. Please describe your symptoms, and I'll provide guidance. You can type or use voice input.

responses.emergency: üö® EMERGENCY: Your symptoms indicate a potential medical emergency. Please call 108 immediately or go to the nearest hospital. Do not delay seeking medical help.
responses.high: ‚ö†Ô∏è High Priority: Your symptoms require medical attention. Please consult a doctor within 24 hours. Monitor your condition closely.
responses.medium: üìã Moderate Concern: Your symptoms should be evaluated by a healthcare provider. Consider scheduling a doctor's appointment within 2-3 days.
responses.low: ‚úÖ Mild Symptoms: Your symptoms appear minor. Rest, stay hydrated, and consult a doctor if symptoms persist.
responses.generalAdvice:
General Suggestions:
‚Ä¢ Drink plenty of water
‚Ä¢ Get adequate rest
‚Ä¢ Monitor your symptoms
‚Ä¢ Seek immediate medical attention if symptoms worsen

firstaid.title: First Aid
firstaid.subtitle: Immediate help in emergency situations
firstaid.emergencySubtext: Get medical help along with first aid
firstaid.noResultsDesc: Please try different search terms or categories
firstaid.important: Important: Seek immediate medical help for serious conditions!

heartAttack.title: Heart Attack
heartAttack.description: Immediate first aid for chest pain and breathing difficulty
steps: Seat the person in a comfortable position
Give aspirin if available (with doctor's advice)
Keep the person calm and don't panic
Start CPR if person becomes unconscious

bleeding.title: Cuts and Bleeding
bleeding.description: How to stop bleeding from cuts and wounds
steps: Press the wound with clean cloth

burns.title: Burns
burns.description: Immediate treatment for burns from fire, hot water or chemicals
steps: Immediately rinse burned area with cold water
Cover burned area with clean cloth
See doctor immediately for severe burns

choking.title: Choking
choking.description: Immediate help when something is stuck in throat
steps: Give 5 sharp blows to the back
If that doesn't work, perform Heimlich maneuver
Start CPR if person becomes unconscious

fainting.title: Fainting
fainting.description: What to do when someone suddenly faints

sprain.title: Sprain
sprain.description: How to reduce pain and swelling from sprains
steps: Apply gentle pressure with elastic bandage
